Tutorial for GNN Active Learning

Installation

That has a paragraph about a main subject and is set when the ‘=’ is at least the same length of the title itself.

Requirements

Python (>=3.8)

Pytorch (>=1.9)

ASE (>=3.22.0)

Torch-scatter

TOML

Myqueue

Building from source

After installed all required packages, installing the code can be quite simple.

git clone https://gitlab.gbar.dtu.dk/swano/Curator.git
cd curator-model
python -m pip install -U .
